site-description: Engage and Retain your guests with location aware technology.

content.title: what is traily
content.description:
Since the hype from Pokemon Go in 2016, geoloaction apps have soared in interest.
Local businesses have been trying to get themselves 'on the map' and we have been helping them.

Until now it has felt like a very seperated approach with local businesses asking us to create an app that would allow their customers to participate in a unique trail.

After creating numerous apps we felt there needed to be a unified approach that allowed businesses to create their own branded trails and offer it to their own clients, without the need for creating an individual app everytime.

And so, traily was born.

content.title: Place Discovery
content.description:
traily makes your trails and POIs more attractive to guests by providing supplementary content that can be accessed when at the location.

Increase dwell time and user spend by engaging you guests at the location.

content.title: Social Sharing
content.description: traily allows your guests to share to their family and friends when they are at one of your locations.

content.title: Offline First App
content.description:
Not all of your POIs will be in an area where a internet connection is available.

The offline experience is seamless and any interactions with the app while offline will be synced to the analytics service once a network connection is reestablished.

Mark certain POIs as network blackspots within the CMS and the app will pre-download content for offline access at these locations.

content.title: In-App CMS
content.description:
Fully control your trail data and create new trails directly from within the app.

Increase dwell time by adding relevant interactive material that your guests can engage with when at the location.

content.title: Real Time User Data
content.description:
With traily you can be reactive to data trends by accessing up to the minute metrics on what your guests are doing.

Want to know where your guests go when its a sunny day?

Want to provide neighboring businesses with footfall metrics so they can optimise their opening hours?

With traily these questions and many more can be answered.

content.title: Visitor Retention
content.description:
By engaging your guests with interactive material, unlocked by physically being at a location, traily increases user engagement with you trail.

This leads to increased dwell time and ultimately, increased user spend.
